mapper.sql: select id, name, cid, region_id, tenant_id from t_franchisee
mapper.select: select f.id, f.cid, f.name, f.uid, f.del_flag, f.create_time, f.update_time, f.battery_deposit,f.tenant_id,f.percent, f.model_type,f.model_battery_deposit from t_franchisee f left join t_franchisee_bind_electricity_battery fb on f.id = fb.franchisee_id where f.del_flag=0 and fb.electricity_battery_id=#{id}

SELECT tf.id, tf.cid, tf.uid, tf.NAME, tf.del_flag, tf.create_time, tf.update_time, tf.battery_deposit, tf.tenant_id, tf.percent, tf.model_type, tf.model_battery_deposit FROM t_franchisee tf WHERE tf.id = ( SELECT franchisee_id FROM t_store WHERE id = ( SELECT store_id FROM t_electricity_cabinet WHERE id = #{id})) and tf.tenant_id=#{tenantId}

select f.id, f.cid, f.name, f.uid, f.del_flag, f.create_time, f.update_time, f.battery_deposit,f.tenant_id,f.percent, f.model_type,f.model_battery_deposit,f.battery_service_fee,f.is_open_service_fee from t_franchisee f left join t_user_info tu on tu.franchisee_id=f.id where tu.uid=#{uid}
